SELECT item.ID, item.ITEM_CODE, item.CD_CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, category.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, item.ITEM_NAME, item.ITEM_DESCRIBE, item.YIELDLY, item.SPEC, item.BASE_PRICE, item.MEMBER_PRICE, item.PRICING_MANNER, item.SELL_STATUS, item.SELL_UNIT, item.SELL_PRICE, item.BAO_ZHI_QI, item.SHI_YI_REN_QUN, item.XIAN_SHI_QIANG_GOU, item.XIN_PIN_CHANG_XIAN, item.RE_MAI_TUI_JIAN FROM cd_item item INNER JOIN cd_category category ON item.CD_CATEGORY_ID = category.id
AND item.CD_CATEGORY_ID IN ( SELECT id from cd_category where cd_category.id = #{categoryId} or cd_category.parent_id = #{categoryId})
AND (item.ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND
item.${label} = 1
ORDER BY item.${orderField} ASCDESC

SELECT item.ID, item.ITEM_CODE, item.CD_CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, category.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, item.ITEM_NAME, item.ITEM_DESCRIBE, item.YIELDLY, item.SPEC, item.BASE_PRICE, item.MEMBER_PRICE, item.PRICING_MANNER, item.SELL_STATUS, item.SELL_UNIT, item.SELL_PRICE, item.BAO_ZHI_QI, item.SHI_YI_REN_QUN, item.XIAN_SHI_QIANG_GOU, item.XIN_PIN_CHANG_XIAN, item.RE_MAI_TUI_JIAN, detail.ITEM_DETAIL_CONTENT as detailContent FROM cd_item item INNER JOIN cd_category category ON item.CD_CATEGORY_ID = category.id LEFT JOIN cd_item_detail detail ON item.ID = detail.CD_ITEM_ID WHERE item.iD = #{id}
